title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 24.1 - Coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 24.1 - Coverage

State Regulations

The requirements and standards of this Part shall apply to
any person defined as a milk dealer pursuant to section
253
(4)
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, unless exempted from licensing pursuant to section 257 of such
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
24.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
